User Story: As a shift leader, I want to view a dashboard of team progress, so that I can monitor deadlines.
As a project manager, I want to view a dashboard of team progress, so that I can monitor deadlines.
As a student, I want to download lecture slides, so that I can study offline.
As a product owner, I want to implement a new system to integrate communications across different stores.
As a manager, I want to schedule meetings and handle shift replacements efficiently.
As a employee, I want to access a shift picker application to manage my time.
As a user of WhatsApp, I want to use it for scheduling meetings and managing shifts.

As a manager, I want to view employee availability and schedule shifts, so that I can plan effectively

As a manager, I want to handle shift replacements and communicate with employees, so that I can maintain proper coverage

As a regular employee, I want to join location-specific groups for announcements and team discussions, so that I stay updated on shop-related information.
As a regular employee, I want to view my profile with my name, location, and manager details, so that I can easily identify who to contact for support.

As a regular employee, I want to cancel a shift swap request before it is accepted, so that I can avoid unnecessary responsibilities.

As a shift leader, I want to approve or reject shift swap requests from employees, so that I can maintain schedule integrity.
As a shift leader, I want to view real-time updates on shift replacements, so that I can address any last-minute changes promptly.
As a shift leader, I want to communicate with managers and other shift leaders via in-app messaging, so that we can coordinate efficiently.
As a shop manager, I want to create and manage employee groups for announcements and team meetings, so that communication is organized by role and location.
As a shop manager, I want to customize shift log checklists for my store, so that I can enforce specific processes like product discounting.
As a shop manager, I want to approve or reject employee leave requests, so that I can ensure staffing levels remain adequate.
As a shop manager, I want to schedule and reschedule meetings with my team, so that we can address operational needs flexibly.
As a shop manager, I want to view detailed shift logs with checklists, so that I can assess team performance and identify areas for improvement.
As a shop manager, I want to assign open shifts to employees based on availability, so that I can optimize workforce utilization.
As a shop manager, I want to monitor employee availability and schedule shifts accordingly, so that I can maintain consistent coverage.
As a shop manager, I want to send targeted announcements to specific groups (e.g., fillers, cashiers), so that relevant information reaches the right audience.
As a shop manager, I want to enable online meetings for remote participants, so that all team members can attend regardless of location.
As a shop manager, I want to track the status of shift replacements and approvals, so that I can ensure timely resolution of scheduling gaps.
As a manager (first, hardware, or service), I want to collaborate with other managers via cross-store groups, so that we can share best practices and resources.
As a manager, I want to create and edit meeting templates with recurring schedules, so that routine discussions are streamlined.
As a manager, I want to view employee contracts and availability in one place, so that I can make informed scheduling decisions.
As a manager, I want to enforce government labor regulations for employee hours and leave, so that compliance is maintained.
As a manager, I want to archive shift logs for at least a year, so that I can reference past operations for audits or training.
As a manager, I want to enable dark mode and other personalization options, so that employees with varying preferences can use the app comfortably.
As an employee, I want to receive reminders for upcoming shifts and meetings, so that I don’t miss scheduled work.
As an employee, I want to report urgent issues (e.g., equipment failure) via a dedicated message channel, so that managers can respond quickly.
As an employee, I want to view my past shifts and performance metrics, so that I can track my contributions and identify growth areas.
As an employee, I want to provide feedback on the system to my manager, so that improvements can be made based on user experience.
As a system administrator, I want to enforce two-factor authentication for all users, so that access to sensitive data is secure.
As a system administrator, I want to monitor login activity and system usage, so that I can detect and address security threats.
As a system administrator, I want to integrate email (Outlook) with the app for meeting scheduling, so that calendar events are synchronized across platforms.
As a system administrator, I want to ensure the app works offline with data syncing when connectivity is restored, so that employees can use it in low-network areas.
As a system administrator, I want to restrict group creation to managers and shift leaders only, so that unauthorized communication is prevented.
As a system administrator, I want to encrypt all work-related messages, so that sensitive information is protected from unauthorized access.
As a system administrator, I want to provide a mobile-first interface with desktop compatibility, so that users can access the app on any device.
As a system administrator, I want to allow cross-store shift replacements with manager approval, so that staffing gaps can be filled efficiently.
As a system administrator, I want to support both in-person and online meeting formats, so that teams can collaborate regardless of location.
As a system administrator, I want to ensure the app is intuitive for non-tech-savvy users, so that all employees can adopt it without extensive training.
As a system administrator, I want to enable real-time updates for shift logs and meeting schedules, so that all users have the most current information.
As a system administrator, I want to archive and delete old shift logs after a set period, so that data storage is managed efficiently.
As a system administrator, I want to allow employees to request unpaid leave for extended periods, so that flexibility is provided for personal needs.
As a system administrator, I want to generate reports on shift compliance and employee performance, so that managers can make data-driven decisions.
